"This app is provided by a 3rd party. Its use of your information is not covered under your carrier's Privacy Policy. You should review the app provider's policies to determine how this app uses your personal data. For more info click below"

"Privacy Alert: If you use a 3rd party app, it may directly collect your personal information or require %1$s to disclose your personal information, including location information (where applicable), to the app provider or some other 3rd party.
Which Privacy Policy Applies? %1$s's Privacy Policy and Terms of Use do not apply to apps on your device that are solely provided by 3rd parties. The 3rd party's policies apply to your use of this app.
Where Can I Find More Information About the 3rd Party's Policies? Check the app's terms of use and/or the app provider's policies for more information about how the app will collect, access, use and disclose your information. Privacy Policies, Terms of Use and other consumer notices MAY BE available on the app provider's website. Be sure you are comfortable with the policies before you use an app.
Where Can I Find More Information About the 3rd Party's Policies? Separately, if you have questions about %1$s's Privacy Policy, please visit %1$s's %2$s and click on the \"Privacy Policy\" link."

"Privacy Alert: If you use a 3rd party app, it may directly collect your personal information or require your carrier to disclose your personal information, including location information (where applicable), to the app provider or some other 3rd party.
Which Privacy Policy Applies? Your carrier's Privacy Policy and Terms of Use do not apply to apps on your device that are solely provided by 3rd parties. The 3rd party's policies apply to your use of this app.
Where Can I Find More Information About the 3rd Party's Policies? Check the app's terms of use and/or the app provider's policies for more information about how the app will collect, access, use and disclose your information. Where Can I Find More Information About the 3rd Party's Policies? Separately, if you have questions about your carrier's Privacy Policy, please visit your carrier's homepage and click on the \"Privacy Policy\" link."

"In order to make content and advertising served to your mobile device more relevant to you, we will collect information about your usage of your mobile device and services.
Your mobile device usage information for the purposes of providing customized marketing will be linked to a randomized, non-persistent and resettable device identifier called the Samsung advertising ID.
You may reset your Samsung advertising ID at any time by visiting the settings menu on your mobile device, and your previous usage information with respect to customized marketing will be de-linked from what is collected under your new Samsung advertising ID.
However, if you reset your Samsung advertising ID, the quality of customized marketing may not be best aligned to your personal interests."

"You may also opt out from receiving customized marketing at any time by visiting the settings menu under the applicable Samsung service application on your mobile device.
However, even if you opt out from receiving customized marketing, it will not affect whether you receive other types of ads and marketing on your mobile devices.
The only difference will be that such ads will not be based on usage information of your mobile device.

Introduction for Tethering

Tethering allows your Android-powered device to be used as a modem to access the Internet on your laptop while on the go. This feature consumes battery power and increases your data usage. This service requires a subscription to the applicable modem plan. Please ensure you have subscribed to the appropriate data plan prior to use. Call 1-877-872-2249 if you need assistance. Use of service constitutes acceptance of the Smartphone Modem Terms.

Portable Wi-Fi hotspot allows your Android-powered device to be used as a mobile hotspot for up to 10 devices using your devices data connection. If using this service, you should secure the connection to deny unauthorized access. This service consumes battery power and increases your data usage. This service requires a plan that includes Tethering and Portable Wi-Fi Hotspot. Please make sure you have subscribed to the appropriate data plan prior to use. Call 1-888-944-9400 if you need assistance. Use of service constitutes acceptance of the "Smartphone Modem Terms.

"When you use the auto update data usage service, we will monitor your data usage for you. This service utilises the auto update data usage service provided by the third-party company Microfountain. The service works by sending a query command to your service provider, and then extracting the used data, remaining data, and the total data from the received data SMS. In order to do this, we must collect your phone number or message centre number, and then provide this information to Microfountain.
By using the auto update data usage service, you agree to Microfountain’s Terms and Conditions.
The extracted data may contain inaccuracies, or data may fail to be extracted because of the operator SMS template update. If this is the case, please update the data manually.

Chapter 11: The Wonderful Emerald City of Oz

"Even with eyes protected by the green spectacles Dorothy and her friends were at first dazzled by the brilliancy of the wonderful City. The streets were lined with beautiful houses all built of green marble and studded everywhere with sparkling emeralds. They walked over a pavement of the same green marble, and where the blocks were joined together were rows of emeralds, set closely, and glittering in the brighness of the sun. The window panes were of green glass; even the sky above the City had a green tint, and the rays of the sun were green.
There were many people, men, women and children, walking about, and these were all dressed in green clothes and had greenish skins. They looked at Dorothy and her strangely assorted company with wondering eyes, and the children all ran away and hid behind their mothers when they saw the Lion; but no one spoke to them. Many shops stood in the street, and Dorothy saw that everything in them was green. Green candy and green pop-corn were offered for sale, as well as green shoes, green hats and green clothes of all sorts. At one place a man was selling green lemonade, and when the children bought it Dorothy could see that they paid for it with green pennies.
There seemed to be no horses nor animals of any kind; the men carried things around in little green carts, which they pushed before them. Everyone seeemed happy and contented and prosperous."
